description: "Kevin alone at home" - I don´t know why but I had to think about that movie the whole time when I visited my last client. But I better start right from the beginning. I got a call this afternoon. On the other end of the line was a guy with a quite young voice. He told me that he desperately needs money. So I offered him a meeting in the evening. He told me he needs it now- later it wouldn´t help anymore. Ok... our slogan is to "help young men". So I agreed and visited him right after the call. He obviously lived in his parent´s home. They were somehow on holidays but supposed to come back that very evening. As he didn´t want to tell me who he was owing the money to I guess he stole it from his parents.
title: Debt Dandy 12
